actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief to the unemployed, and for other purposes.
short_title: Workforce Fairness and Tax Relief Act of 2008

summary.text: Workforce Fairness and Tax Relief Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) repeal the inclusion of unemployment compensation in gross income; (2) allow tax-free distributions from retirement plans for unemployed individuals; (3) allow an exclusion from gross income for employee severance payments; and (4) increase the tax credit for the health insurance costs of individuals receiving trade adjustment assistance and certain pension payments.

titles.title: Workforce Fairness and Tax Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief to the unemployed, and for other purposes.
